documentation.text: @notice This cheat codes interface is named _CheatCodes so you can use the CheatCodes interface in other testing files without errors
@notice Initializes cheat codes in order to use ffi to compile Vyper contracts

statements.documentation: @notice create a list of strings with the commands necessary to compile Vyper contracts
@notice compile the Vyper contract and return the bytecode

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory[] memory) external returns (bytes memory)

statements.documentation: @notice deploy the bytecode with the create instruction
@notice check that the deployment was successful
@notice return the address that the contract was deployed to
